text: BREAKING: Large convoy of unidentified military vehicles spotted heading towards Border Region X.
Local residents in Border Region X report hearing heavy artillery fire. Power outages confirmed.
Defense Ministry announces 'Routine Training Exercises' near the border. Denies any aggressive intent.
US Satellite imagery confirms massive troop buildup. Pentagon warns of imminent incursion.
URGENT: Bridge connecting the two regions has been destroyed. Civilians trapped.
Foreign Ministry condemns 'Western hysteria' and provocation regarding border security measures.
Reports of cyberattacks hitting regional hospitals and infrastructure. Communications down.
UN Security Council calls for emergency meeting regarding the escalation in Region X.
